oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Silver goblet
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Silver goblet presented to Eliza H. (Hudson) Ward from her mother on the occasion of her birthday. Inscription reads, "Eliza H. Ward, from Mother--10th Feb. 1864." The family lived in Nashville during the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
